casebody.data:
2002-1918 (La. 10/25/02)

Anthony CAMPORA, Jr. v. FALSTAF, L.L.C. No. 2002-C-1918. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Campora, Anthony Jr.; — Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review Office Of Workers’ Comp. Dist. 8, No. 98-06035; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-CA-2014.

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., would grant the writ.
